sn56.54:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yatthima mahanadiyo samsandanti samenti, seyyathidam—
sn56.54:1.2: ganga, yamuna, aciravati, sarabhu, mahi, tam udakam parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya, thapetva dve va tini va udakaphusitani.
sn56.54:1.4: katamam nu kho bahutaram—yam va sambhejjaudakam parikkhinam pariyadinnam, yani dve va tini va udakaphusitani avasitthani”ti?
sn56.54:1.5: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaram sambhejjaudakam yadidam parikkhinam pariyadinnam; appamattakani dve va tini va udakaphusitani avasitthani.
sn56.54:1.6: Sankhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhagampi na upenti sambhejjaudakam parikkhinam pariyadinnam upanidhaya dve va tini va udakaphusitani avasitthani”ti.
